item.title: Philips IntelliBridge Enterprise
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.philips.com/a-w/security/security-advisories.html Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Vulnerable NCSC-NL Software only products with customer owned Operating Systems. For products solutions where the server was provided it is customer responsibility to validate and deploy patches. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-20 12:37:57 NCSC-NL Updated communityVulnerable.
